name: Rift Coaster HD Remastered VR
description: Prepare yourself for chills and thrills, cause it's going to be really intense! A must have for every roller coaster fan!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
